name: Caravan (itch) (onionclub, Gordismo, joryu, joy)
description:
Caravan is visual novel merchant simulator with a focus on character interactions and light-hearted storytelling.

Play as a mortal merchant in a world where humans coexist with Gods and monsters--oh my! Help solve their otherworldly problems with your this-worldly human wares!

Follow our twitter for upcoming updates!

Twitter

  • Stock up and sell wares to your Mythical customers!
  • Haggle and get the most out of your items
  • Help one of your customers after his awakening through a branching narrative side quest!
  • Explore a modern world where Gods and humans coexist. Travel around town to maximize your profits!
  • Decorate your caravan with a variety of wallpapers, window frames, and more!
    • Access your decorations via your in-game phone's Atmosphere app
  • Ever-changing game economy affected by the news!

Answering the call to a mysterious (and cryptic) job posting, our heroine (that's you!) signs a contract with a shady corporation, thrusting her into a hidden and mythical part of the world... as a merchant?!

Circe is a harpy in Caduceus' employ. She joins you on your journey into the world of  trade as a guide. Prickly and standoffish, Circe has much to learn about your human ways.

After losing her home in the ocean, Sedna wanders the Earth to promote environmental preservation. Where will her journey take her...?

We plan on adding more characters and stories to Caravan as development continues. Please look forward to them!

Privacy

There are analytics in this prototype that gives us important stats about the game which will help in future development. You can opt out by selecting the "Privacy" button in the title screen which will link you to an opt out form.

Game Controls & Menu
  • Left mouse click to interact
  • Press Esc to bring up the Game Exit Menu
